mapper.insert: INSERT INTO company_detail(com_represent, com_url, com_birth, com_size, com_emp_count, com_sales, com_content, com_vision, com_welfare, com_no) VALUES (#{comRepresent}, #{comUrl}, #{comBirth}, #{comSize}, #{comEmpCount}, #{comSales}, #{comContent}, #{comVision}, #{comWelfare}, #{comNo})
mapper.update: UPDATE company_detail SET com_represent = #{comRepresent}, com_birth = #{comBirth}, com_size = #{comSize}, com_emp_count = #{comEmpCount}, com_sales = #{comSales}, com_content = #{comContent} WHERE com_no = #{comNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO company(com_name, com_category, com_address, com_business, user_no) VALUES (#{comName}, #{comCategory}, #{comAddress}, #{comBusiness}, #{userNo})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM company WHERE user_no = #{userNo} LIMIT 0, 1
